attribs.name: personality_traits
attribs.current:
I am always calm and polite, no matter what the situation. I never raise my voice or let my emotions control me.
I'm secretive due to the tenants of Shar.

attribs.name: ideals
attribs.current: I trust that my deity will guide my actions.

attribs.name: bonds
attribs.current:
I serve Shar in all things.
I only had one person I could call friend, Caradin, he gave me his shortsword and two daggers, I will not part with them.

attribs.name: miscellaneous_notes
attribs.current:
+2 Dexterity, +1 Wisdom
Size: Medium
Shade base land speed is 30 feet.
Superior Darkvision. Your darkvision has a radius of 120 feet.
Sunlight Sensitivity. You have disadvantage on attack rolls and on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight when you, the target of your attack, or whatever you are trying to perceive is in direct sunlight.
Sunlight Weakness. While in direct sunlight, the shade has disadvantage on attack rolls, ability checks, and saving throws.
Shadow morphology: while in shadow form you only require 4 hours of sleep to perform a long rest and you require half as much food and water.
Shadow Stealth. While in dim light or darkness, the Shade can take the Hide action as a bonus action.
Weapon Familiarity: Shades have proficiency with the longbow, spear, and shortsword.
Clear Thoughts: Shades gain advantage on saving throws against mind-affecting effects. Shades are trained to have ordered, focused minds, and thus can more easily resist mental invasions.
Shadowkin Magic. You know the message cantrip. When you reach 5th level, you can also cast the darkness spell once per day. Wisdom is your spellcasting ability for these spells.
Shadow resistance: you have resistance to necrotic damage and vulnerability to radiant damage
Automatic Languages: Common. Bonus Languages(Pick 1): Elven, Dwarven, Draconic, Celestial, Infernal, and Abyssal.

The list.
Ewan and Terry, Guards of that prison, Live in Eskelios.
Geoffrey and Wiles, gate guards, Fairhaven
Emmy, The dumb cunt. i owe 1000 gold
Quariian, Shitty Ranger that tripped me in the dessert.
Renfrey, noble character, also pc played by Robert. Shadow marches
Pelcast the greedy- deceased
Molin: Keepsafe (Effected his mind with spell) Mia
Vegar, called myself and others incompetent
Yalfaren, halfelf, misinformed me intentionally
Barlo, Brought back Santa after I killed him
Dysmas, Revealed the Islands existence
Alouriel, compelled me, took everything from me


When the seal of shadows falls, the helm of violation shall be found.

attribs.name: spells_level_2_macro_var
attribs.current: [Darkness](~repeating_spell2_-kyrjpz39fthtlgusb5w_spell), [Darkvision](~repeating_spell2_-kyrjpz39fthtlgusb5x_spell), [Silence](~repeating_spell2_-kyrjpz39fthtlgusb5y_spell), [Pass without Trace](~repeating_spell2_-kyrjpz39fthtlgusb5z_spell)

attribs.name: repeating_spell0_-KYRjPz39fTHTlgusB5T_content
attribs.current:
You create a ghostly, skeletal hand in the space of a creature within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the creature to assail it with the chill of the grave. On a hit, the target takes 1d8 necrotic damage, and it can't regain hit points until the start of your next turn. Until then, the hand clings to the target.

If you hit an undead target, it also has disadvantage on attack rolls against you until the end of your next turn.

attribs.name: repeating_spell0_-KYRjPz39fTHTlgusB5U_materials
attribs.current: A short piece of copper wire

attribs.name: repeating_spell0_-KYRjPz39fTHTlgusB5U_content
attribs.current:
You point your finger toward a creature within range and whisper a message. The target (and only the target) hears the message and can reply in a whisper that only you can hear.

You can cast this spell through solid objects if you are familiar with the target and know it is beyond the barrier. Magical silence, 1 foot of stone, 1 inch of common metal, a thin sheet of lead, or 3 feet of wood blocks the spell. The spell doesn't have to follow a straight line and can travel freely around corners or through openings.

attribs.name: repeating_spell0_-KYRjPz39fTHTlgusB5V_content
attribs.current:
You create a sound or an image of an object within range that lasts for the duration. The illusion also ends if you dismiss it as an action or cast this spell again.

If you create a sound, its volume can range from a whisper to a scream. It can be your voice, someone else's voice, a lion's roar, a beating of drums, or any other sound you choose. The sound continues unabated throughout the duration, or you can make discrete sounds at different times before the spell ends.

If you create an image of an object - such as a chair, muddy footprints, or a small chest - it must be no larger than a 5-foot cube. The image can't create sound, light, smell, or any other sensory effect. Physical interaction with the image reveals it to be an illusion, because things can pass through it.

If a creature uses its action to examine the sound or image, the creature can determine that it is an illusion with a successful Intelligence (Investigation) check against your spell save DC. If a creature discerns the illusion for what it is, the illusion becomes faint to the creature.

attribs.name: repeating_spell2_-KYRjPz39fTHTlgusB5W_materials
attribs.current: Bat fur and a drop of pitch or piece of coal

attribs.name: repeating_spell2_-KYRjPz39fTHTlgusB5W_content
attribs.current:
Magical darkness spreads from a point you choose within range to fill a 15-foot radius sphere for the duration. The darkness spreads around corners. A creature with darkvision can't see through this darkness, and nonmagical light can't illuminate it.

If the point you choose is on an object you are holding or one that isn't being worn or carried, the darkness emanates from the object and moves with it. Completely covering the source of the darkness with an opaque object, such as a bowl or a helm, blocks the darkness.

If any of this spell's area overlaps with an area of light created by a spell of or lower, the spell that created the light is dispelled.

attribs.name: repeating_spell2_-KYRjPz39fTHTlgusB5X_materials
attribs.current: Either a pinch of dried carrot or an agate

attribs.name: repeating_spell2_-KYRjPz39fTHTlgusB5X_content
attribs.current: You touch a willing creature to grant it the ability to see in the dark. For the duration, that creature has darkvision out to a range of 60 feet.

attribs.name: repeating_spell2_-KYRjPz39fTHTlgusB5Y_content
attribs.current: For the duration, no sound can be created within or pass through a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on a point you choose within range. Any creature or object entirely inside the sphere is immune to thunder damage, and creatures are deafened while entirely inside it. Casting a spell that includes a verbal component is impossible there.

attribs.name: repeating_spell2_-KYRjPz39fTHTlgusB5Z_materials
attribs.current: Ashes from a burned leaf of mistletoe and a sprig of spruce

attribs.name: repeating_spell2_-KYRjPz39fTHTlgusB5Z_content
attribs.current: A veil of shadows and silence radiates from you, masking you and your companions from detection. For the duration, each creature you choose within 30 feet of you (including you) has a +10 bonus to Dexterity (Stealth) checks and can't be tracked except by magical means. A creature that receives this bonus leaves behind no tracks or other traces of its passage.

attribs.name: repeating_spell3_-KZ-AINvVAyIGOsfENFX_materials
attribs.current: Free body part in which to break neck

attribs.name: repeating_spell3_-KZ-AINvVAyIGOsfENFX_content
attribs.current: You inflict force enough to break the targets neck, killing them instantly.

attribs.name: miscellaneous_notes_2
attribs.current:
3 karma, 2 cp

Vampiric abilities: 
Undead. You are an undead creature. All spells and effects that would apply to undead creatures apply to you. As an undead creature, you do not need to breathe, cannot suffocate and you do not age. Unlike many undead, though, you still require sleep.

Forbiddance. You can't enter a residence without an invitation from one of the occupants.

Harmed by running water. You take 10 acid damage if you end your turn in running water.

Stake to the heart. If a piercing weapon made of wood is driven into the heart while you are incapacitated during a long rest, you are paralyzed until the stake is removed.

Sunlight hyper sensitivity. You take 10 radiant damage when you start your turn in sunlight and lack protective clothing that completely obscures the sun. While exposed to sunlight and suffering this damage from it, you have disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks.

Spiderclimb in areas of dim light or darkness.
+1 to stealth checks.
+1 to ac, shadowy scales
Advantage on perception checks involving hearing.
Shapeshifting: Small rodents
Silenceing Bite

Gifts of Shar:
Shadow's Respite

+2 Katana. 1d10 2 handed weapon. Finesse. Keen.* 
Repeats your attack's damage 2 turns later. Recharges when you do a killing blow. Holds 1 charge at a time.

Keen: Crits on a 19 or 20.

attribs.name: repeating_trait_-KXK-l4izQFaOOP3Zj6T_content
attribs.current:
At 6th level you gain the ability lo step from one shadow into another. When you are in dim light or darkness as a bonus action you can teleport up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space you can see that is also in dim light
or darkness. You then have advantage on the first melee attack you make before the end of the turn.

attribs.name: saving_throw_query_var
attribs.current: ?{Saving Throw|Strength +3,{{title=Strength Saving throw}} {{roll1=[[@{shaped_d20}@{d20_mod} + 3[proficient] + 0[str]]]}} {{roll2=[[@{shaped_d20}@{d20_mod} + 3[proficient] + 0[str]]]}}|Dexterity +7,{{title=Dexterity Saving throw}} {{roll1=[[@{shaped_d20}@{d20_mod} + 3[proficient] + 4[dex]]]}} {{roll2=[[@{shaped_d20}@{d20_mod} + 3[proficient] + 4[dex]]]}}|Constitution +2,{{title=Constitution Saving throw}} {{roll1=[[@{shaped_d20}@{d20_mod} + 2[con]]]}} {{roll2=[[@{shaped_d20}@{d20_mod} + 2[con]]]}}|Intelligence +0,{{title=Intelligence Saving throw}} {{roll1=[[@{shaped_d20}@{d20_mod} + 0[int]]]}} {{roll2=[[@{shaped_d20}@{d20_mod} + 0[int]]]}}|Wisdom +3,{{title=Wisdom Saving throw}} {{roll1=[[@{shaped_d20}@{d20_mod} + 3[wis]]]}} {{roll2=[[@{shaped_d20}@{d20_mod} + 3[wis]]]}}|Charisma -1,{{title=Charisma Saving throw}} {{roll1=[[@{shaped_d20}@{d20_mod} + -1[cha]]]}} {{roll2=[[@{shaped_d20}@{d20_mod} + -1[cha]]]}}|Death +0, {{title=Death Saving throw}} {{death_saving_throw_successes=@{death_saving_throw_successes}}} {{death_saving_throw_failures=@{death_saving_throw_failures}}} {{roll1=[[@{shaped_d20}@{d20_mod} + ]]}} {{roll2=[[@{shaped_d20}@{d20_mod} + ]]}}}

attribs.name: repeating_classfeature_-KekeRENbB68nTwqsxEV_content
attribs.current: Beginning at 1st level, while you are wearing no armor and not wielding a shield, your AC equals 10 + your Dexterity modifier + your Wisdom modifier.

attribs.name: repeating_classfeature_-KekeREOrBSDQj-xY0OQ_content
attribs.current:
Your practice of martial arts gives you mastery of combat styles that use unarmed strikes and monk weapons, which are shortswords and any simple melee weapons that don't have the two-‑handed or heavy property.
You gain the following benefits while you are unarmed or wielding only monk weapons and you aren't wearing armor or wielding a shield:•
You can use Dexterity instead of Strength for the attack and damage rolls of your unarmed strikes and monk weapons.
•You can roll a d4 in place of the normal damage of your unarmed strike or monk weapon. This die changes as you gain monk levels, as shown in the Martial Arts column of the Monk table.
•When you use the Attack action with an unarmed strike or a monk weapon on your turn, you can make one unarmed strike as a bonus action. For example, if you take the Attack action and attack with a quarterstaff, you can also make an unarmed strike as a bonus action, assuming you haven't already taken a bonus action this turn.
Certain monasteries use specialized forms of the monk weapons. For example, you might use a club that is two lengths of wood connected by a short chain (called a nunchaku) or a sickle with a shorter, straighter blade (called a kama). Whatever name you use for a monk weapon, you can use the game statistics provided for the weapon.

attribs.name: repeating_classfeature_-KekeREPDAOxoOEae0oz_content
attribs.current: You can attack twice, instead of once, whenever you take the Attack action on your turn.

attribs.name: repeating_classfeature_-KekeREPDAOxoOEae0p-_content
attribs.current:
Your training allows you to harness the mystic energy of ki. Your access to this energy is represented by a number of ki points.
You can spend these points to fuel various ki features. You start knowing three such features: Flurry of Blows, Patient Defense, and Step of the Wind. You learn more ki features as you gain levels in this class.
When you spend a ki point, it is unavailable until you finish a short or long rest, at the end of which you draw all of your expended ki back into yourself. You must spend at least 30 minutes of the rest meditating to regain your ki points.

attribs.name: repeating_classfeature_-KekeREQCdF2QL0IVap5_content
attribs.current: Immediately after you take the Attack action on your turn, you can spend 1 ki point to make two unarmed strikes as a bonus action.

attribs.name: repeating_classfeature_-KekeREQCdF2QL0IVap6_content
attribs.current: You can spend 1 kipoint to take the Dodge action as a bonus action on your turn.

attribs.name: repeating_classfeature_-KekeREQCdF2QL0IVap7_content
attribs.current: You can spend 1 ki point to take the Disengage or Dash action as a bonus action on your turn, and your jump distance is doubled for the turn.

attribs.name: repeating_classfeature_-KekeREQCdF2QL0IVap8_content
attribs.current:
Your speed increases by 15 feet while you are not wearing armor or wielding a shield. This bonus increases when you reach certain monk levels, as shown in the Monk table.
At 9th level, you gain the ability to move along vertical surfaces and across liquids on your turn without falling during the move.

attribs.name: repeating_classfeature_-KekeREQCdF2QL0IVap9_content
attribs.current:
You can use your reaction to deflect or catch the missile when you are hit by a ranged weapon attack. When you do so, the damage you take from the attack is reduced by [[d10 + @{dexterity_mod}[dex] + @{monk_level}[monk level]]].
If you reduce the damage to 0, you can catch the missile if it is small enough for you to hold in one hand and you have at least one hand free. Ifyou catch a missile in this way, you can spend 1 ki point to make a ranged attack with the weapon or piece of ammunition you just caught, as part of the same reaction. You make this attack with proficiency, regardless of your weapon proficiencies, and the missile counts as a monk weapon for the attack, which has a normal range of 20 feet and a long range of 60 feet

attribs.name: repeating_classfeature_-KekeRER9Jt0V3ZqqnMD_content
attribs.current: You can use your reaction when you fall to reduce any falling damage you take by [[5 * @{monk_level}]].

attribs.name: repeating_classfeature_-KekeRER9Jt0V3ZqqnME_content
attribs.current: You can interfere with the flow of ki in an opponent's body. When you hit another creature with a melee weapon attack, you can spend 1 ki point to attempt a stunning strike. The target must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or be stunned until the end of your next turn.

attribs.name: repeating_classfeature_-KekeRER9Jt0V3ZqqnMF_content
attribs.current: Your unarmed strikes count as magical for the purpose of overcoming resistance and immunity to nonmagical attacks and damage.

attribs.name: repeating_classfeature_-KekeRESwN16rT5fzkX2_content
attribs.current: Your instinctive agility lets you dodge out of the way of certain area effects, such as a blue dragon's lightning breath or a fireball spell. When you are subjected to an effect that allows you to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, you instead take no damage if you succeed on the saving throw, and only half damage if you fail.

attribs.name: repeating_classfeature_-KekeRESwN16rT5fzkX3_content
attribs.current: You can use your action to end one effect on yourself that is causing you to be charmed or frightened.

attribs.name: classfeatures_macro_var

attribs.name: repeating_classfeature_-KhZuAM-8lUkDhLypNgJ_content
attribs.current: You can attack twice, instead of once, whenever you take the Attack action on your turn.

attribs.name: repeating_equipment_-KibitnOd3nGah81CJZW_content
attribs.current: This glass jar, 3 inches in diameter, contains [[1d4 + 1]] doses of a thick mixture that smells faintly of aloe. The jar and its contents weigh 1/2 pound. As an action, one dose of the ointment can be swallowed or applied to the skin. The creature that receives it regains [[2d8 + 2]] hit points, ceases to be poisoned, and is cured of any disease.

attribs.name: repeating_offense_-Kq96UG6jhhAH3JdXQpy_attack_string
attribs.current: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target.

attribs.name: repeating_offense_-Kq96UG6jhhAH3JdXQpz_attack_string
attribs.current: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target.

attribs.name: repeating_offense_-Kq96UG6jhhAH3JdXQq-_attack_string
attribs.current: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target.

attribs.name: repeating_offense_-Kq96UG7yKoVGukx7fg1_content
attribs.current:
You create a ghostly, skeletal hand in the space of a creature within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the creature to assail it with the chill of the grave. On a hit, the target takes 1d8 necrotic damage, and it can't regain hit points until the start of your next turn. Until then, the hand clings to the target.

If you hit an undead target, it also has disadvantage on attack rolls against you until the end of your next turn.

This spell's damage increases by 1d8 when you reach 5th level (2d8), 11th level (3d8), and 17th level (4d8).

attribs.name: repeating_offense_-Kq96UG7yKoVGukx7fg1_attack_string
attribs.current: +6 to hit, range 120 ft., one target.

attribs.name: repeating_offense_-Kq96UG7yKoVGukx7fg2_attack_string
attribs.current: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target.

attribs.current: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target.

attribs.name: repeating_offense_-Kq96UG7yKoVGukx7fg4_content
attribs.current: Repeats your attack's damage 2 turns later. Recharges when you do a killing blow. Holds 1 charge at a time.

attribs.name: repeating_offense_-Kq96UG8fryYXTiKMPeB_content
attribs.current: The target's hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the necrotic damage taken, and the vampire regains hit points equal to that amount. The reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0. Target must be grappled by the vampire, incapacitated or restrained.

attribs.name: repeating_spell0_-KYRjPz39fTHTlgusB5T_higher_level
attribs.current: This spell's damage increases by 1d8 when you reach 5th level (2d8), 11th level (3d8), and 17th level (4d8).
